name: zephyr-documentation
description: Zephyr Cloud documentation with module federation

scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm dev:host" "pnpm dev:ai" "pnpm dev:cloud" "pnpm dev:mobile" "pnpm dev:sidepanel" "pnpm dev:web"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter ai build && pnpm --filter cloud build && pnpm --filter mobile build && pnpm --filter sidepanel build && pnpm --filter web build && pnpm --filter zephyr-cloud-docs build
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && pnpm --filter ai install && pnpm --filter cloud install && pnpm --filter mobile install && pnpm --filter sidepanel install && pnpm --filter web install

author: Zephyr Cloud
